cells.text_content:
How to Find the
Mistake
cells.pdf_text_content: How to Find the Mistake

cells.text_content: How to Fix the Mistake
cells.pdf_text_content: How to Fix the Mistake

cells.pdf_text_content: How to Avoid the Mistake

cells.text_content: Corrective Action
cells.pdf_text_content: Corrective Action

cells.text_content:
Correction
Program(s)
Available
cells.pdf_text_content: Correction Program(s) Available

cells.text_content:
1) Has your plan
document been
updated within the past
few years to reflect
recent law changes?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 1) Has your plan document been updated within the past few years to reflect recent law changes? (More)

cells.text_content:
Review annual
cumulative list
published close to
year-endto see if plan
made all required law
changes(for example,
Notice 2009-98).
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review annual cumulative list published close to year-end to see if plan made all required law changes (for example, Notice 2009-98). (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
VCP: Streamlined application
available. See Appendix F and
schedules 1 and 2.
Adopt amendments for missed
law changes.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS VCP: Streamlined application available. See Appendix F and schedules 1 and 2. Adopt amendments for missed law changes. (More)

cells.text_content:
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Resort to a calendar
(tickler) that notes when
you must complete
amendments. Review your
plan document annually.
Maintain regular contact
with the company that sold
you the plan.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Resort to a calendar (tickler) that notes when you must complete amendments. Review your plan document annually. Maintain regular contact with the company that sold you the plan. (More)

cells.text_content:
2) Are the plan's
operations based on
the terms ofthe plan
document?
Failure to follow plan
terms is a very
common mistake.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 2) Are the plan1s operations based on the terms of the plan document? Failure to follow plan terms is a very common mistake. (More)

cells.text_content:
Independent review of
plan and its operation.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Independent review of plan and its operation. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
Apply reasonable correction
method that would place
affected participants in the
position they would have been
in if there were no operational
plan defects.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS Apply reasonable correction method that would place affected participants in the position they would have been in if there were no operational plan defects. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Develop a communication
mechanism to make all
relevant parties aware of
changes on a timely and
accurate basis (best
practices). Perform a
review at least annually to
ensure you are following
plan terms.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Develop a communication mechanism to make all relevant parties aware of changes on a timely and accurate basis (best practices). Perform a review at least annually to ensure you are following plan terms. (More)

cells.text_content:
3) Is the plan's
definition of
compensation for all
deferrals and
allocations used
correctly?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 3) Is the plan1s definition of compensation for all deferrals and allocations used correctly? (More)

cells.text_content:
Review the plan
document.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review the plan document. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
Corrective contribution or
distribution.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS Corrective contribution or distribution. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Perform annual reviews of
compensation definitions
and ensure that the person
in charge of determining
compensation is properly
trained to understand the
plan document.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Perform annual reviews of compensation definitions and ensure that the person in charge of determining compensation is properly trained to understand the plan document. (More)

cells.text_content:
4) Were employer
matching contributions
made to all appropriate
employees under the
terms of the plan?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 4) Were employer matching contributions made to all appropriate employees under the terms of the plan? (More)

cells.text_content:
Review the plan
document to determine
the correct matching
contribution formula
and compare it to what
is used in operation.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review the plan document to determine the correct matching contribution formula and compare it to what is used in operation. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
Base correction upon the plan's
terms and other applicable
information at the time of the
mistake.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS Base correction upon the plan1s terms and other applicable information at the time of the mistake. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Contact plan administrators
to ensure that they have
adequate and sufficient
employment and payroll
records to make
calculations.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Contact plan administrators to ensure that they have adequate and sufficient employment and payroll records to make calculations. (More)

cells.text_content:
5) Has the plan
satisfied the 401(k)
nondiscrimination tests
(ADP and ACP)?
More
cells.pdf_text_content: 5) Has the plan satisfied the 401(k) nondiscrimination tests (ADP and ACP)? (More)

cells.text_content:
Independent review to
determine if highly
compensated and
nonhighly
compensated
employees are properly
classified.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Independent review to determine if highly compensated and nonhighly compensated employees are properly classified. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
Correction method for
ADP/ACP test failures: Make
qualified nonelective
contributions (QNECs) on
behalf of the nonhighly
compensated employees
Appendix B (section 2.01)
One-to-one correction method.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS Correction method for ADP/ACP test failures: Make qualified nonelective contributions (QNECs) on behalf of the nonhighly compensated employees Appendix B (section 2.01) One-to-one correction method. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Consider a safe harbor
plan. Communicate with the
plan administrator to
ensure proper employee
classification. Ensure both
you and the plan
administrators are familiar
with the terms of the plan.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Consider a safe harbor plan. Communicate with the plan administrator to ensure proper employee classification. Ensure both you and the plan administrators are familiar with the terms of the plan. (More)

cells.pdf_text_content: --Trends Potential Mistake

cells.pdf_text_content: -Tips-

cells.text_content:
How to Find the
Mistake

cells.pdf_text_content: How to Avoid the Mistake

cells.text_content: Corrective Action
cells.pdf_text_content: Corrective Action

cells.text_content:
Correction
Program(s)
Available
cells.pdf_text_content: Correction Program(s) Available

cells.text_content:
6) Were alleligible
employees identified
and given the
opportunity to make an
elective deferral
election (exclusion of
eligible employees)?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 6) Were all eligible employees identified and given the opportunity to make an elective deferral election (exclusion of eligible employees)? (More)

cells.text_content:
Review plan document
sections on eligibility
and participation.
Check with plan
administrators to find
out when employees
are entering the plan.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review plan document sections on eligibility and participation. Check with plan administrators to find out when employees are entering the plan. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
6.02(7), Appendix A (section
.05), Appendix B (section 2.02)
Employer must make a
qualified nonelective
contribution (QNEC) to the plan
on behalf of the employee that
compensates for the missed
deferral opportunity.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS 6.02(7), Appendix A (section.05), Appendix B (section 2.02) Employer must make a qualified nonelective contribution (QNEC) to the plan on behalf of the employee that compensates for the missed deferral opportunity. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Monitor census information
and apply participation
requirements.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Monitor census information and apply participation requirements. (More)

cells.text_content:
7) Are elective
deferrals limited to the
amounts under IRC
§402(g) for the
calendar year and have
any excess deferrals
been distributed?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 7) Are elective deferrals limited to the amounts under IRC §402(g) for the calendar year and have any excess deferrals been distributed? (More)

cells.text_content:
Inspect deferral
amounts for plan
participants to ensure
that the employee has
not exceeded the limits.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Inspect deferral amounts for plan participants to ensure that the employee has not exceeded the limits. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
Appendix A (section.04)
Distribute excess deferrals.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS Appendix A (section.04) Distribute excess deferrals. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Work with plan
administrators to ensure
that they have sufficient
payroll information to verify
the deferral limitations of
§402(g) were satisfied.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Work with plan administrators to ensure that they have sufficient payroll information to verify the deferral limitations of §402(g) were satisfied. (More)

cells.text_content:
8) Have you timely
deposited employee
elective deferrals?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 8) Have you timely deposited employee elective deferrals? (More)

cells.text_content:
Determine the earliest
date you can segregate
deferrals from general
assets; compare that
date with the actual
deposit dates and any
plan document
requirements.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Determine the earliest date you can segregate deferrals from general assets; compare that date with the actual deposit dates and any plan document requirements. (More)

cells.text_content:
Usually DOL through VFCP for
prohibited transaction. May
also be EPCRS.

For both VFCP and EPCRS,
deposit into the plan's trust all
elective deferrals withheld and
applicable earnings resulting
from the late deposit of
amounts to the trust.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Usually DOL through VFCP for prohibited transaction. May also be EPCRS. For both VFCP and EPCRS, deposit into the plan1s trust all elective deferrals withheld and applicable earnings resulting from the late deposit of amounts to the trust. (More)

cells.text_content:
SCP*
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: SCP* VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Coordinate closely with
payroll provider to
determine the earliest date
you can reasonably
segregate the deferral
deposits from general
assets. Set up procedures
to ensure you make
deposits by that date.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Coordinate closely with payroll provider to determine the earliest date you can reasonably segregate the deferral deposits from general assets. Set up procedures to ensure you make deposits by that date. (More)

cells.text_content:
9) Do participant loans
conform to the
requirements of the
plan document and IRC
§72(p)?
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: 9) Do participant loans conform to the requirements of the plan document and IRC §72(p)? (More)

cells.text_content:
Review the plan
document and all
outstanding loans to
ensure the loans
comply with the plan's
terms and that the
employees are
repaying their loans
timely.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review the plan document and all outstanding loans to ensure the loans comply with the plan1s terms and that the employees are repaying their loans timely. (More)

cells.text_content:
EPCRS
6.07, Appendix F (Schedule 5)
Some failures may be
corrected by corrective
repayment and/or modification
of loan terms.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: EPCRS 6.07, Appendix F (Schedule 5) Some failures may be corrected by corrective repayment and/or modification of loan terms. (More)

cells.text_content:
VCP
Audit CAP
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: VCP Audit CAP (More)

cells.text_content:
Review and follow the plan
provisions relating to
making loans, including the
amount of loan, term of the
loan and repayment terms.
Make sure there are
procedures in place to
prevent loans that are
prohibited transactions.
(More)
cells.pdf_text_content: Review and follow the plan provisions relating to making loans, including the amount of loan, term of the loan and repayment terms. Make sure there are procedures in place to prevent loans that are prohibited transactions. (More)
